channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: He left the US for an internship. Trump's travel ban made it impossible to return
item.description: The Trump administration has thrown up new obstacles for international students, from travel bans to a pause in visa appointments and new layers of ve...

item.title: Judge set to hear arguments on Minnesota's immigration crackdown after fatal shootings
item.description: A federal judge is set to hear arguments Monday on whether to pause an immigration crackdown in Minnesota

item.title: A private aircraft carrying 8 people has crashed on takeoff at Maine’s Bangor airport, FAA says
item.description: A private aircraft carrying 8 people has crashed on takeoff at Maine’s Bangor airport, FAA says

item.title: Northeast gets last brunt of winter storm that brought ice, snow, cold to much of the US
item.description: The Northeastern U.S. is getting the last brunt of a massive winter storm that dumped snow, sleet and ice across much of the southern and eastern U.S....

item.title: Timeline of the year since an Army helicopter and plane collided over Washington
item.description: A collision between a U.S. Army Black Hawk helicopter and an American Airlines jet killed 67 people in January 2025
